Name: Precursor Squad
Description:
Squad composed of Precursor agents. Precursor Squad can continuously and stably deal damage to enemies. Can use Annihilation Command.

Can attack the ground and air.

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.
Root.Name: Move

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Root.Name: Stop

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
Root.Name: Hold Position

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.
Root.Name: Attack

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to patrol between their current position and the target area. Units will attack enemies and move to engage nearby enemies.
Root.Name: Patrol

Root.Tooltip: Squad Leader will throw a Shock Grenade. Reduce 50% atk speed and movement speed of enemy units at target area.
Root.Name: Shock Grenade

Root.Tooltip: Precursor Squad are equipped with heavy armor. Squad members gain 40 additional health.
Root.Name: Heavy Armor

Root.Tooltip:
Grant each Squad member additional 110 health, 4 armor, and 15% dmg reduction.
Active skill will let the Squad blink to target direction.
Root.Name: Terminator EXO Teleport

Root.Tooltip: Precursor Squad gain detection and group healing at rate of 6 per sec.
Root.Name: Medical Detector

Root.Tooltip:
Increase movement by 1 and atk speed by 50% of mechanic units near Precursor Squad.
Active skill will let the Squad to repair a mechanic unit at rate of 50 per sec.
Root.Name: Mechanical Maintenance

Root.Tooltip: Gestalt Zero's tactic squad can gain experience in combat to achieve higher ranking, gaining additional abilities and have slightly improved stats. Squad will gain experience equal to twice of the supply cost for every enemy unit killed nearby. If a tactic squad dealt the killing blow, it will gain additional 100% experience.
Root.Name: Gestalt Ranking

Root.Tooltip: Switch the weapon of this tactic squad.
Root.Name: Switch Armory

Root.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Root.Name: Cancel

Root.Tooltip: Recruit a soldier for the squad. At most 4 soldiers can be recruited.
Root.Name: Recruit Soldier

Root.Tooltip:
Order all tactic bombers to continuously attack enemy ground units within target area, until every units is destroyed or cancelled. Every round of bombos can deal 300 dmg, and will reload for 10 sec after that.

Airstrike Order CD applies to all Tactic Squad.
More Gestalt Bomber Platforms you have, larger the area Airstrike Order can apply to.
Root.Name: Annihilation Command

Root.Tooltip:
Order all tactic bombers to continuously attack enemy ground units within target area, until every units is destroyed or cancelled. Every round of bombos can deal 300 dmg, and will reload for 10 sec after that.

Airstrike Order CD applies to all Tactic Squad.
More Gestalt Bomber Platforms you have, larger the area Airstrike Order can apply to.
Root.Name: Annihilation Command

0002.Tooltip:
Equip Assault Rifle. Basic ranged weapon.

Can attack the ground and air.
0002.Name: Equip Assault Rifle

0002.Tooltip:
Purchase and equip Flamethrower. Effective against light unit. Can deal aoe dmg.

Can attack ground.
0002.Name: Purchase And Equip Flamethrower

0002.Tooltip:
Equip Flamethrower. Effective against light unit. Can deal aoe dmg.

Can attack ground.
0002.Name: Equip Flamethrower

0002.Tooltip:
Purchase and equip Storm Assault Rifle. Ranged weapon with extremely fast atk speed.

Can attack the ground and air.
0002.Name: Purchase And Equip Storm Assault Rifle

0002.Tooltip:
Equip Storm Assault Rifle. Ranged weapon with extremely fast atk speed.

Can attack the ground and air.
0002.Name: Equip Storm Assault Rifle

0002.Tooltip:
Purchase and equip SAM Assault Rifle. Added anti-air missile module to Assault Rifle.

Can attack the ground and air.
0002.Name: Purchase And Equip SAM Assault Rifle

0002.Tooltip:
Equip SAM Assault Rifle. Added anti-air missile module to Assault Rifle.

Can attack the ground and air.
0002.Name: Equip SAM Assault Rifle

0002.Tooltip:
Purchase and equip Vulcan Shock Cannon. Well-balanced raid weapon. Can deal aoe dmg within a tiny range.

Can attack the ground and air.
0002.Name: Purchase And Equip Vulcan Shock Cannon

0002.Tooltip:
Equip Vulcan Shock Cannon. Well-balanced raid weapon. Can deal aoe dmg within a tiny range.

Can attack the ground and air.
0002.Name: Equip Vulcan Shock Cannon

0002.Tooltip:
Purchase and equip Heavy Laser Cannon. Extremely effective against armored units but with slow atk speed.

Can attack the ground and air.
0002.Name: Purchase And Equip Heavy Laser Cannon

0002.Tooltip:
Equip Heavy Laser Cannon. Extremely effective against armored units but with slow atk speed.

Can attack the ground and air.
0002.Name: Equip Heavy Laser Cannon

0002.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
0002.Name: Cancel
